delistPair(uint256).notice: Delists a trading pair by index.

groupMaxOI(uint256).notice: Get the maximum open interest (OI) for a group.

groupOI(uint256).notice: Get the total open interest (OI) for a group.

guaranteedSlEnabled(uint256).notice: Check if guaranteed stop loss is enabled for a trading pair.

isUSDCAligned(uint256).notice: Helper method to Check pair is usdc aligned

lossProtectionMultiplier(uint256,uint256.notice: Get the loss protection multiplier for a trading pair and tier.

maxWalletOI(uint256).notice: Get the maximum open interest (OI) for a wallet in a trading pair.

pairBackupFeed(uint256).notice: Get the Chainlink backup feed information of a trading pair.

pairCloseFeeP(uint256).notice: Get the fee for closing a position on a trading pair.

pairFeed(uint256).notice: Get the Pyth feed information of a trading pair.

pairGroupIndex(uint256).notice: Get the group index to which a trading pair belongs.

pairJob(uint256).notice: Fetches relevant information for an order.

pairLimitOrderFeeP(uint256).notice: Get the fee for executing a TP/SL limit close.

pairMaxLeverage(uint256).notice: Get the maximum leverage available for a trading pair.

pairMaxOI(uint256).notice: Get the maximum open interest (OI) for a trading pair.

pairMinLevPosUSDC(uint256).notice: Get the minimum leveraged position size (in USDC) allowed for a trading pair.

pairMinLeverage(uint256).notice: Get the minimum leverage available for a trading pair.

pairOpenFeeP(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Calculate the fee for opening a leveraged position on a trading pair based on skew

pairPriceImpactMultiplier(uint256).notice: Get priceImpact multiplier for a certain pair

pairSkewImpactMultiplier(uint256).notice: Get priceImpact multiplier for a certain pair

pairSpreadP(uint256).notice: Get the spread percentage of a trading pair.

pairsBackend(uint256).notice: Get backend details for a specific trading pair, its group, and associated fees.

updateGroupOI(uint256,uint256,bool,bool).notice: Updates the collateral open interest for a trading group.

updateLossProtectionMultiplier(uint256,u.notice: Updates the loss protection multiplier for a given trading pair.
